tooltip.html:
Inherited
By default, this option is selected for all nodes below the IP Services node. When selected, the node will inherit monitoring choices from its parent.

Enabled
When selected, monitoring choices are individually enabled for this node. (The node does not inherit monitoring choices from its parent.) To select this option, you must first deselect the Inherited option.

Event Severity
Select an event severity (Critical, Error, Warning, Info, or Debug) if you have selected the Enabled option. This severity level is applied to the event created when the service fails.

Service Keys
Optionally, add associated service keys or a description.
